name: La Sportiva Skwama Rock Shoes - Unisex
description: Work micro-nubbins and polished edges with these super sensitive and flexible pseudo-slippers. They have a sticky rubber toe patch to aid hooking and scrumming and an S-heel construction to add power to your heel hooks. The split sole is designed to spread under load to reduce deformation and help you balance on tiny edges.Uppers are leather with microfiber, unlined for a glove-like fit and sensitive feel.Hook-and-loop closure for easy on/off and to tune in a performance fit.S-Heel offers stable, confident heel hooking.Slip-lasted construction with 0.8mm LapsoFlex midsoles.Sticky rubber toe patch.Split sole construction offers grip on small edges.Soles are 4mm Vibram® XS Grip2.La Sportiva suggests downsizing 1-1.5 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from your street shoe size.
